title: Fixed broken pipe notice from server.php
description: Added error handler in public/index.php to suppress broken pipe notices that occur when client disconnects before server finishes writing to stdout in vendor/laravel/framework/src/Illuminate/Foundation/resources/server.php. Error handler specifically targets E_NOTICE errors containing 'Broken pipe' from server.php file.
notes: Root cause was stale PHP server process. Broken pipe notice was a symptom, not a root cause. Fixed by killing old server processes.

title: Playlists: DB + API
description: Create migrations and models: playlists (id, device_token_id FK, name, created_at, updated_at) and playlist_items (id, playlist_id FK, article_id FK, position INT, created_at). Add API endpoints: POST /api/playlists (create), PUT /api/playlists/{id} (rename), POST /api/playlists/{id}/items (add), PUT /api/playlists/{id}/items/{item_id} (reorder), DELETE /api/playlists/{id}/items/{item_id} (remove).
acceptance_criteria: Playlist CRUD works via API. Items can be added, reordered, removed. Relationships work (Playlist->items, PlaylistItem->article).

title: Player: Empty state with animated sound wave illustration and CTA
description: Create beautiful empty state when queue is empty: animated SVG sound wave that pulses gently, encouraging text, and a prominent CTA button linking to Library. Consider a subtle gradient background overlay for depth.

title: Request TTS: POST /api/articles/{id}/tts
description: Endpoint that creates/updates article_audio record (status=pending) and dispatches GenerateArticleAudio job. Returns {status: 'pending'} immediately. Idempotent: if already pending/ready, return current status without re-queuing.
acceptance_criteria: POST /api/articles/1/tts returns {status: 'pending'} and job is queued. Subsequent calls return current status without duplicate jobs.

title: Add API endpoint to fetch articles by IDs for queue functionality
description: When playing a queue from library or playlist, we need an API endpoint to fetch multiple articles by their IDs. Currently only single article fetch exists.

title: Enable API routing
description: Add routes/api.php and register it in bootstrap/app.php using withRouting(api: ..., apiPrefix: 'api') per Laravel 12 conventions. Ensure /api/* routes work with auto-prefix.
acceptance_criteria: GET /api/test returns 404 (route not found) but /api prefix is applied correctly

title: Service worker: app shell caching
description: Create public/sw.js that caches app shell (HTML, CSS, JS, Flux assets) on install. Register service worker in resources/js/app.js using navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js'). Ensure app opens offline and shows UI (even if content empty).
acceptance_criteria: App opens offline and shows UI shell. Service worker is registered and active. Network tab shows cached assets.

title: Player: Enhanced progress bar with buffering state and time tooltips
description: Enhance the progress bar: add a secondary track showing buffered content, show time tooltip on hover that follows cursor, add subtle glow effect on the progress indicator. Make the scrubber handle more prominent with a shadow.

title: Cleanup unused starter kit code and fix landing page
description: Remove unused components, pages, and controllers from the original Laravel starter kit. Ensure the landing page (welcome/dashboard) is correctly configured for the app's purpose and not a placeholder.

title: Pest tests: token + save + tts + audio
description: Create Pest feature tests: POST /api/token issues token and stores hash, POST /api/save requires bearer token and stores/dedupes article, POST /api/articles/{id}/tts dispatches job, GET /api/articles/{id}/audio requires auth and returns audio when ready. Mock ChatterboxTurboTts service and GenerateArticleAudio job where appropriate.
acceptance_criteria: php artisan test tests/Feature/ApiTest.php passes. All critical API endpoints are covered with happy/failure paths.

title: Device token issuance endpoint
description: Implement POST /api/token that generates a unique device token (store hash in DB, return raw token once). Token should be base64url-safe, 32+ bytes. Store device_token_id, created_at, last_seen_at.
acceptance_criteria: POST /api/token returns {token: '...'} and stores hash in database. Subsequent calls return same token or new one based on implementation choice.

title: Fix missing mediaSession play action handler in player
description: Line 138 in player.blade.php shows the mediaSession play handler is missing (blank line). This breaks media controls integration.

title: DB schema: audio tracking
description: Add article_audio table: id, article_id FK, status (pending|ready|failed), audio_path, duration_seconds (nullable), voice (nullable), error_message (nullable), created_at, updated_at. Add Article->audio() relationship.
acceptance_criteria: Migration runs. Article::find(1)->audio relationship exists and can be null or return ArticleAudio model.

title: Update service worker to cache audio files for offline playback
description: Service worker currently only caches static assets. Should also cache audio files when they're fetched to enable offline playback of cached articles.

title: Fix Storage disk specification in ArticleController getAudio method
description: Line 116 and 124 in ArticleController use Storage::exists() and Storage::download() without specifying disk('public'), but audio files are stored on 'public' disk. This will cause 404 errors.

title: Player: Dynamic gradient background that shifts with playback state
description: Create a cinematic gradient background that subtly animates based on playback. When idle: cool dark tones. When playing: warm pulsing gradients. Use CSS custom properties for colors, animate with CSS transitions. This sets the foundation for all other player visuals.

title: Player: Volume slider and playback speed controls (0.5x-2x)
description: Add secondary controls: volume slider with mute button, playback speed selector (0.5x, 0.75x, 1x, 1.25x, 1.5x, 2x). Position below main controls. Store preferences in localStorage. Use Flux components where possible.

title: Player + queue screen (Volt)
description: Create Volt page for now playing: shows current track (title, progress bar, duration), queue list (reorder via drag/drop, remove items), play/pause/next/prev controls, offline indicator. Integrate with Media Session API. Mini-player style inspired by Spotify.
acceptance_criteria: Continuous playback across queued items. Controls work via Media Session. Queue can be reordered and items removed. Progress bar updates correctly.

title: Media Session integration
description: Implement navigator.mediaSession metadata (title, artist, album, artwork) and action handlers (play, pause, previoustrack, nexttrack, seekto) that control audio element and queue state. Update metadata when track changes. Ensure iOS lock screen / Control Center shows controls.
acceptance_criteria: iOS lock screen shows play/pause/next/prev controls. Controls work correctly. Metadata updates when track changes.

title: Bearer token auth guard (API-only)
description: Create middleware that reads Authorization: bearer <token> header, resolves DeviceToken model, attaches to request. Reject with 401 if invalid/missing. Register in bootstrap/app.php (Laravel 12 style).
acceptance_criteria: Protected endpoints return 401 without token, 200 with valid bearer token in Authorization header

title: Redesign player, library, playlists pages
description: Full UI redesign for /library, /player (Now Playing), and /playlists (index/show/create) while preserving behavior.

title: Setup screen (Volt): Shortcut + token + Safari steps
description: Create Volt page (resources/views/livewire/app/setup.blade.php) that: fetches/creates token on mount, shows 'Copy token' button (copies to clipboard), shows 'Install Shortcut' button linking to https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/3b5591d2beb34816a48c3b2c25234335, displays Safari-only usage instructions (Share → Shortcut → paste token). Route to /setup or /.
acceptance_criteria: First-time user sees clear instructions. Can copy token with one tap. Shortcut install button opens iCloud link. Instructions are Safari-specific.

title: Critical: APP_KEY configuration preventing app from starting
description: Server returns 500 error: 'No application encryption key has been specified' even though APP_KEY exists in .env and config shows it has a value. Laravel cannot read the key at runtime. This blocks all browser testing. Need to investigate why Laravel can't read the key - may be .env file permissions, formatting, or caching issue. User needs to verify .env file and potentially regenerate APP_KEY.
notes: Root cause: stale PHP server process on port 8000 from previous session that did not have APP_KEY loaded. Fixed by killing old process. New server started on 8001 works correctly.

title: Queue job: generate audio for article
description: Create GenerateArticleAudio job that: sets article_audio status to pending, calls ChatterboxTurboTts service with article body, stores audio file to storage/app/public/audio/{article_id}.mp3, updates status to ready or failed with error_message. Make job idempotent.
acceptance_criteria: Job runs successfully. On failure, status=failed and error_message is stored. Audio file exists at expected path when ready.

title: Pint formatting
description: Run vendor/bin/pint --dirty to format all PHP code according to project style. Fix any formatting issues introduced during development.
acceptance_criteria: vendor/bin/pint --dirty produces no changes. All PHP code matches project style guide.

title: Enhance PWA manifest with additional icon sizes for better iOS support
description: Current manifest only has SVG and 180x180 PNG. iOS PWA needs multiple sizes: 192x192, 512x512 for better home screen experience.

title: Player: Drag-to-reorder queue with smooth transition animations
description: Implement drag-to-reorder in the queue using Alpine's Sortable or custom drag handlers. Add smooth FLIP animations for position changes. Show drag handle on hover. Update queue array reactively.

title: Fix player next() function - missing playTrack() call
description: The next() function in player.blade.php line 182-186 is incomplete - it checks the condition but doesn't call playTrack(). This breaks queue navigation.

title: Player: Glass-morphism queue sidebar with blur backdrop and border glow
description: Redesign the queue sidebar with glass-morphism effect: backdrop-blur, semi-transparent background, subtle border with glow effect. Add staggered entrance animations for queue items. Use Tailwind backdrop-blur-xl and border gradients.

title: Player: Hero visualization - animated audio waveform/equalizer with pulsing gradient orb
description: Replace the static music note icon with an animated audio visualizer. Create a pulsing gradient orb that responds to isPlaying state. Use CSS animations with keyframes for smooth organic movement. Consider adding subtle particle effects or concentric rings.

title: Fix DeviceToken creation - missing token_hash in setup page
description: In setup.blade.php line 17-20, DeviceToken is created without token_hash. The middleware expects token_hash for authentication, so tokens created here won't work.

title: Inconsistent API authentication: player uses query param instead of Authorization header
description: In player.blade.php, audio requests use query parameter (?token=...) instead of Authorization header like other API calls. While this may be intentional for caching, it's inconsistent with the rest of the API. Consider standardizing on Authorization header or document why query param is used.
notes: Updated AuthenticateDeviceToken middleware to accept token from query parameter as fallback, maintaining backward compatibility

title: Shortcut contract: POST /api/save
description: Implement endpoint matching iOS Shortcut: accepts JSON {url, title, body}, requires bearer token auth, deduplicates by device_token_id + url (update existing or create new). Returns JSON suitable for Shortcut notification (e.g., {ok: true, title}).
acceptance_criteria: POST /api/save with bearer token and {url, title, body} creates/updates article. Duplicate URL for same token updates existing record.

title: PWA manifest + iOS meta
description: Create public/manifest.webmanifest with name, short_name, icons, theme_color, display=standalone, start_url. Update resources/views/partials/head.blade.php with <link rel=manifest>, apple-mobile-web-app-capable, apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style, apple-mobile-web-app-title meta tags.
acceptance_criteria: iOS 'Add to Home Screen' shows correct app name and icon. Manifest validates. Theme color applies to status bar.

title: Add missing event listeners for play-article and play-queue in player
description: The player component listens for 'play-playlist' but not for 'play-article' (dispatched from library) or 'play-queue' (dispatched from playlist show page). These events need handlers to populate the queue.

title: ArticleController::getAudio() missing file existence check before download
description: In ArticleController::getAudio(), when audio_path is a local path, Storage::download() is called without checking if the file exists. This will cause an error if the file is missing. Should add a file_exists() or Storage::exists() check before attempting download.
notes: Added Storage::exists() check before download to prevent errors when file is missing

title: Pest tests: playlists + ordering
description: Create Pest feature tests for playlist endpoints: create, rename, add items, reorder items (test position invariants), remove items. Test that reordering maintains correct positions and no gaps.
acceptance_criteria: php artisan test tests/Feature/PlaylistTest.php passes. Playlist CRUD and ordering logic is fully covered.

title: Duplicate playlist routes defined in web.php
description: Routes for playlists are defined twice in routes/web.php: lines 21-23 and lines 40-42. This is redundant and could cause confusion. Should remove the duplicate definitions (lines 40-42).

title: DB schema: tokens + articles
description: Create migrations and models for device_tokens (id, token_hash, created_at, last_seen_at) and articles (id, device_token_id FK, url, title, body TEXT, created_at, updated_at). Add DeviceToken->articles() relationship.
acceptance_criteria: php artisan migrate runs successfully. DeviceToken::factory()->create()->articles relationship works.

title: Player: Mobile-responsive controls with bottom sheet queue
description: Make player fully responsive: on mobile, show a compact mini-player with queue as a bottom sheet overlay. Add swipe left/right for prev/next. Ensure controls are thumb-reachable. Consider PWA-style full-screen mode.

title: Improve audio caching to handle range requests (206 status) properly
description: AudioCache.getAudio() excludes 206 responses from caching, but browsers use range requests for audio seeking. Need to handle partial content responses.

title: Style + polish pass (Flux/Tailwind)
description: Review all Volt pages and apply consistent spacing, typography, dark mode support. Ensure UI feels polished and professional (Spotify/Audible inspiration). Fix any layout issues, improve loading states, add smooth transitions. Ensure Flux components are used consistently.
acceptance_criteria: UI looks professional and polished. Dark mode works everywhere. Spacing and typography are consistent. Loading states are smooth.

title: Library screen (Volt): list + save + play
description: Create Volt page for library view: fetch articles from GET /api/articles, display list with search/filter (ready status), per-item actions: Play (streams or plays cached), Save (POST /api/articles/{id}/tts then caches when ready), Add to queue, Add to playlist. Use Flux components for UI consistency.
acceptance_criteria: End-to-end: save article from Shortcut → appears in library → tap Save → status becomes Ready → tap Play → audio plays.

title: Download audio: GET /api/articles/{id}/audio
description: Endpoint that requires bearer token auth, checks article_audio.status. If ready, streams audio file with proper Content-Type (audio/mpeg). If pending/failed, returns 409 with JSON {status, message}.
acceptance_criteria: GET /api/articles/1/audio returns audio file when ready, 409 when pending/failed. Browser can play audio directly from URL.

title: Offline audio caching helper
description: Create JS helper function that fetches /api/articles/{id}/audio and stores in Cache Storage (key: article-{id}-{version}). Check cache first before fetching. Handle cache quota errors. Store metadata (duration, title) in IndexedDB for quick access.
acceptance_criteria: Once audio is cached, playback works in airplane mode. Cache is checked before network request. Metadata persists in IndexedDB.

title: Player page error: Undefined constant currentIndex
description: Player page throws 500 error at player.blade.php:49 with 'Undefined constant currentIndex'. This is likely a Blade syntax issue where a JavaScript variable is being interpreted as PHP.
notes: Fixed by: 1) Moving @script and style blocks inside root div, 2) Using plain HTML elements with x-bind instead of Flux components for Alpine.js bindings, 3) Using x-show with spans instead of template x-if

title: List library: GET /api/articles
description: Implement paginated list endpoint with optional filters (ready status, search by title/url). Return JSON with articles array, pagination metadata. Use Eloquent API Resources for consistent formatting.
acceptance_criteria: GET /api/articles returns paginated list. ?search=term filters by title/url. ?status=ready filters by audio ready status.

title: Playlists UI (Volt)
description: Create Volt pages: playlist list view, playlist detail view (shows items, add from library button), add-to-playlist modal/dropdown from library items. Allow reordering items via drag/drop. Play playlist as queue source.
acceptance_criteria: User can create playlists, add articles from library, reorder items, and play entire playlist as queue.

title: TTS service wrapper (Chatterbox Turbo)
description: Create app/Services/ChatterboxTurboTts.php that wraps HTTP client calls to Chatterbox Turbo TTS API. Accept text input, return audio file bytes/stream. Use Laravel HTTP client, config-driven base URL/API keys from .env.
acceptance_criteria: Service class is unit-testable (mockable HTTP client). Can generate audio from text string. Handles errors gracefully.
